medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent right upper quadrant and epigastric pain worsening over the past week, now continuous for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started three months ago and have worsened over the past week, becoming continuous over the past 24 hours. Factors such as food or PO intake do not relate to the pain. No fevers, chills, nausea, or vomiting reported, but there is somewhat decreased appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Umbilical hernia repair at age unspecified. No other past medical history noted.
